display_name: Women's Health Initiative Insomnia Rating Scale: Typical night sleep
description:
Item from the Women's Health Initiative Insomnia Rating Scale. [Levine et al. (2003)](https://psycnet.apa.org/record/2003-06188-004)

Original question: *Pick the answer that best describes how often you experienced the situation in the past 4 weeks. 11. Overall, was your typical night's sleep during the past 4 weeks:*
